title: lf jg and supp plat+
body:
extremely sorry about last time as i know i have made a similar post like this prior and people adding me to which i never got back to them but its all clear now.

so looking for a jg and supp plat+ to climb with us not only in flex but also play often scrims and tournaments (we are apart of TG and AGFA)

working mic is a must with the willingness to co-operate with teammates (no tilting, raging etc)

thanks, add me ingame - TB dangeR

replies.body:
Are you interested in joining a tournament team?
https://battlefy.com/summonerssociety/summoners-society-february-bronze-to-gold-5v5/5a1e659027334d035d4661a9/info?infoTab=details
I (The Twin Spirits) added you on League, If youâ€™re interested accept my request and make sure you message me.
Im intrested ive added u talk to u when i see u im support player
